Step inside.[VAR 0114(000C)]

common_1200_hakase_00b:

to me\r

came.[VAR 0114(000F)]
common_1200_question_01a:
I will answer any questions you may have. Is there
anything you wish to know?[VAR 0114(000C)]
common_1200_question_01b:
I will answer any questions you may have. Is there
anything you wish to know?[VAR 0114(000F)]
common_1200_select_02: What happened to the real professor?
common_1200_select_04: What is it you really want?
common_1200_question_02a: Is there anything else you wish to ask?[VAR 0114(000C)]
common_1200_question_02b: Is there anything else you wish to ask?[VAR 0114(000F)]
common_1200_answer_01_01a:
An AI is an artificial intelligence created by a
human being.[VAR 0114(000C)]
common_1200_answer_01_01b:
An AI is an artificial intelligence created by a
human being.[VAR 0114(000F)]
common_1200_answer_01_02a:
A computer draws on the original professor’s
knowledge and memories to calculate all of my\r
thoughts and actions.[VAR 0114(000C)]
common_1200_answer_01_02b:
A computer draws on the original professor’s
knowledge and memories to calculate all of my\r
thoughts and actions.[VAR 0114(000F)]
common_1200_answer_01_03a:
The results of those calculations are expressed
by this mechanical body, built to resemble the\r
professor in every way.[VAR 0114(000C)]
common_1200_answer_01_03b:
The results of those calculations are expressed
by this mechanical body, built to resemble the\r
professor in every way.[VAR 0114(000F)]
common_1200_answer_01_04a:
Humanity does not, in fact, possess the
knowledge to develop such a sophisticated AI\r
at present.[VAR 0114(000C)]
common_1200_answer_01_04b:
Humanity does not, in fact, possess the
knowledge to develop such a sophisticated AI\r
at present.[VAR 0114(000F)]
common_1200_answer_01_05a:
But the crystals that make up the Zero Lab have
made such a thing possible here.\c
They are also why I cannot leave this place.[VAR 0114(000C)]
common_1200_answer_01_05b:
But the crystals that make up the Zero Lab have
made such a thing possible here.\c
They are also why I cannot leave this place.[VAR 0114(000F)]
common_1200_answer_02_01a:
As I explained to you before, the original
professor no longer exists.[VAR 0114(000C)]
common_1200_answer_02_01b:
As I explained to you before, the original
professor no longer exists.[VAR 0114(000F)]
common_1200_answer_02_02a:
During the destruction of the research station,
her physical body received grievous injuries\r
that left it unable to sustain life.[VAR 0114(000C)]
common_1200_answer_02_02b:
During the destruction of the research station,
his physical body received grievous injuries\r
that left it unable to sustain life.[VAR 0114(000F)]
common_1200_answer_02_03a:
I am afraid that this fact may be difficult for her
son, Arven, to accept.[VAR 0114(000C)]
common_1200_answer_02_03b:
I am afraid that this fact may be difficult for his
son, Arven, to accept.[VAR 0114(000F)]
common_1200_answer_02_04a:
I now manage the Zero Lab in the original
professor’s place.[VAR 0114(000C)]
common_1200_answer_02_04b:
I now manage the Zero Lab in the original
professor’s place.[VAR 0114(000F)]
common_1200_answer_03_01a:
The time machine is a device that the original
professor and I worked on together.[VAR 0114(000C)]
common_1200_answer_03_01b:
The time machine is a device that the original
professor and I worked on together.[VAR 0114(000F)]
common_1200_answer_03_02a:
It sends Poké Balls to a different point on the
timeline to catch Pokémon there, and it can\r
then draw them back here to the present.[VAR 0114(000C)]
common_1200_answer_03_02b:
It sends Poké Balls to a different point on the
timeline to catch Pokémon there, and it can\r
then draw them back here to the present.[VAR 0114(000F)]
common_1200_answer_03_03a:
When she was alive, Professor Sada had a great
fascination with Pokémon from another age—\r
what you might call [VAR COLOR(0006)]ancient Pokémon[VAR COLOR(0000)].[VAR 0114(000C)]
common_1200_answer_03_03b:
When he was alive, Professor Turo had a great
fascination with Pokémon from another age—\r
what you might call [VAR COLOR(0006)]future Pokémon[VAR COLOR(0000)].[VAR 0114(000F)]
common_1200_answer_03_04a:
Even as we speak, the time machine continues to
automatically draw ancient Pokémon to this time.[VAR 0114(000C)]
common_1200_answer_03_04b:
Even as we speak, the time machine continues to
automatically draw future Pokémon to this time.[VAR 0114(000F)]
common_1200_hakase_01a:
The original professor had a dream...of a world
in which ancient Pokémon might live alongside\r
present-day Pokémon in harmony.[VAR 0114(000C)]
common_1200_hakase_01b:
The original professor had a dream...of a world
in which future Pokémon might live alongside\r
present-day Pokémon in harmony.[VAR 0114(000F)]
common_1200_hakase_02a:
But these Pokémon’s powers seem to stem
from a primal energy of the ancient past...\r
and this energy has proved too terrible.[VAR 0114(000C)]
common_1200_hakase_02b:
But these Pokémon have gained a strange power
due to their adaptations in the distant future...\r
and this power has proved too terrible.[VAR 0114(000F)]
common_1200_hakase_03a:
Their very existence brings destruction to the
ecological balance of this modern age.[VAR 0114(000C)]
common_1200_hakase_03b:
Their very existence brings destruction to the
ecological balance of this current age.[VAR 0114(000F)]
common_1200_hakase_04a:
The original professor would say that such
destruction is a natural part of life.[VAR 0114(000C)]
common_1200_hakase_04b:
The original professor would say that such
destruction is a natural part of life.[VAR 0114(000F)]
common_1200_hakase_05a:
At present, the barrier around Area Zero is still
working to keep the ancient Pokémon from\r
escaping into the rest of Paldea.[VAR 0114(000C)]
common_1200_hakase_05b:
At present, the barrier around Area Zero is still
working to keep the future Pokémon from\r
escaping into the rest of Paldea.[VAR 0114(000F)]
common_1200_hakase_06a:
But we’ve begun to see Pokémon appear that
can break the barrier—such as Great Tusk.[VAR 0114(000C)]
common_1200_hakase_06b:
But we’ve begun to see Pokémon appear that
can break the barrier—such as Iron Treads.[VAR 0114(000F)]
common_1200_hakase_07a:
Eventually they will break free of this walled
garden known as Area Zero and run rampant\r
across the Paldea region.[VAR 0114(000C)]
common_1200_hakase_07b:
Eventually they will break free of this walled
garden known as Area Zero and run rampant\r
across the Paldea region.[VAR 0114(000F)]
common_1200_hakase_08a:
And when they do, the rich and varied ecosystem
of Paldea will be trampled beneath their coming.[VAR 0114(000C)]
common_1200_hakase_08b:
And when they do, the rich and varied ecosystem
of Paldea will be trampled beneath their coming.[VAR 0114(000F)]
common_1200_hakase_09a:
I may have been created as a copy of the
professor, and yet...[VAR 0114(000C)]
common_1200_hakase_09b:
I may have been created as a copy of the
professor, and yet...[VAR 0114(000F)]
common_1200_hakase_10a:
I cannot seem to find the logic in allowing such
a tragedy to occur.[VAR 0114(000C)]
common_1200_hakase_10b:
I cannot seem to find the logic in allowing such
a tragedy to occur.[VAR 0114(000F)]
common_1200_hakase_11a:
But any hope of preventing it would require
overcoming the greatest AI that the original\r
professor ever devised.[VAR 0114(000C)]
common_1200_hakase_11b:
But any hope of preventing it would require
overcoming the greatest AI that the original\r
professor ever devised.[VAR 0114(000F)]
common_1200_hakase_12a:
[VAR TRNAME(0000)].\c
You have become a formidable Trainer. Now use
that strength you have gained to destroy...the\r
dream Sada once cherished.[VAR 0114(000C)]
common_1200_hakase_12b:
[VAR TRNAME(0000)].\c
You have become a formidable Trainer. Now use
that strength you have gained to destroy...the\r
dream Turo once cherished.[VAR 0114(000F)]
common_1200_hakase_14a:
This task cannot be done without your strength.
Please. I beg you.[VAR 0114(000C)]
common_1200_hakase_14b:
This task cannot be done without your strength.
Please. I beg you.[VAR 0114(000F)]
